column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: research area. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ont: <http://example.com/ontology#> .ont:ResearchArea rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:hasTitle rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ont:ResearchArea ;    rdfs:range xsd:string .ont:hasDepartment rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ont:ResearchArea ;    rdfs:range ont:Department .ont:Department rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:hasSupervisor rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ont:ResearchArea ;    rdfs:range ont:Supervisor .ont:Supervisor rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:hasStudent rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ont:ResearchArea ;    rdfs:range ont:Student .ont:Student rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:hasFunding rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ont:ResearchArea ;    rdfs:range ont:Funding .ont:Funding rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:hasPublication rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ont:ResearchArea ;    rdfs:range ont:Publication .ont:Publication rdf:type rdfs:Class .
